history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00072
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING THE GRANT OF STUDENT FARE DISCOUNT PRIVILEGES ON PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Institutionalizes the grant of a fixed fare discount to qualified students on land, water and air utilities throughout the year, except during summer vacation.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
